TopicTitle: Game started crashing since mod install( module manager)

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys

installed Docking Camera ( kurs) and the Module manager, having a ball with it even though its crashed 6 times since install, but with the saves working well i'v lost nothing, any one else having probs, or is it something i'v done ..or not done as I a have made no changes any where, except the start menus where I turn every thing green and save each time it loads up..
Maybe you should report the issue in the appropriate threads.
If you only have those two mods you could try removing Docking Camera, to see if the crashing stops.
